name: A Nightmare Among Us
description:
Play with your friends in the same room with your own computer, try to discover their role, cooperate and betray them in order to achive your own goal! This is a Meta – Game!

The game consist in a "boardgame -based" map and four players (with their own role which is unknown to the others) in a turn-based gameplay structure.
During each turn you have to choose your next move (explore the map, attack another player, force a door) and then the actions of all player are performed at the same time.
The players have to think about their action and try to cooperate in the real word as much as they can, in order to avoid wrong moves, don't benefit their rivals and achive their goal.
